attributes.additional_details: The public have lost faith in the government, a huge storm is brewing and its a salient fact that can't be ignored, the government is meant to serve and the public at large feel they are showing that they think they rule, its not acceptable in a democracy. Restore faith now and let us choose. The Uk is in turmoil because of government over reach, We don't want to suffer because you signed up to deals that we don't want and without our consent. Its dictatorial and unfair, do the right thing!
attributes.background: We the people want a referendum over all and every policy of net zero!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636066
